title: Tasty Chicken Yakhni Pulao Recipe
content:
A flavourful chicken pulao which is packed with aroma and is so delicious with some raita and salad. Taste so delicious.

Pulao or biryani comes handy when coming to lunch box recipes. This recipe goes perfect with some raita, I served it with onion raita. You can enjoy yourself with any raita of choice. You will need a handful of ingredients to make this pulao and it comes together in less than 40 mins.

 

Chicken Yakhni Pulao Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 45 mins

Total time: 55 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 6 to 8 servings

 

Ingredients

FOR COOKING CHICKEN:

Chicken - 1 kg with bones

Water - 5 cups

Shahi Jeera - 2 teaspoon

Cardamom / Yelakai - 5

Cloves / Krambu - 5

Bay Leaf - 1

Cinnamon / Pattai - 1 stick

Star Anise - 1

Salt to taste

Garam Masala Powder - 2 teaspoons

 

FOR BIRYANI:

Oil - ½ cup

Cumin Seeds / Jeerakam - ½ teaspoon

Cardamom/ Yelakai - 4

Cloves / Krambu - 4

Cinnamon / Pattai - 1 stick

Mace - 2 piece

Kalpassi - 1 piece

Onion - 2 large sliced thinly

Curd / Yogurt - ½ cup

Green Chilli - 5 to 6

Ginger Garlic paste - 2 tablespoon

Basmati Rice- 3 cups

Chicken Stock - 4.5 cup

Salt to taste

Kewra Water - ½ teaspoon

 

Instructions

Soak basmati rice for 30 mins.

Take the chicken and all spices in a large pot. Boil for 20 mins. Strain it and set aside.

Heat oil in a pot. Add in whole spices and let them fry.

Add in onions and chilies and fry till golden.

Add in ginger garlic paste and saute till raw smell leaves.

Add in curd and mix well.

Add in chicken and toss well.

Add in rice and mix well.

Add chicken stock and salt. Mix well.

Bring it to a boil. Cover and simmer for 15 to 20 mins.

Turn off the heat and let it stand for 10 mins.

Fork through the rice and serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
